Upload FITS file Function

Uploads FITS files.

astrodesim.upload_fits.upload_fits(file)

Fuction uploads a fits file

Arg:

file (str): path to fits file with desired image

Returns

header file sim_data (numpy.ndarray): image data

Return type

header (astropy.io.fits.header.Header)
